Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] If both players have a "Wind-Up Zenmaines" that has used its effect to prevent its own destruction, the turn player will get the opportunity to resolve his/her effect before the non-turn player during the End Phase.

PSCT.Base:
2 Level 3 monsters
If this face-up card on the field would be destroyed, you can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card instead. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this effect was used this turn: Target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
